All Implemented Interfaces:
com.jme.util.export.Savable, com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.common.interfaces.IDynamicEntity, com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.common.interfaces.IEntity
public class SnowballEntity
extends DynamicEntity

SnowballEntity extends DynamicEntity to define a snow ball that is thrown by a character.

Version:
Creation date: 07-25-2008 16:40 EST, Modified date: 07-28-2008 16:50 EST
